Html:
Hi,

Does quickgraph have methods for these simple requests?  Or do you have to use algorithms / observers etc to do this.

  1. Vertex.GetAdjacentOutEdgeVertexs() - i.e. just want to get the parents of a vertex
  2. Vertex.GetAdjacentInEdgeVertexs() - i.e. just want to get the children of a vertex
  3. BidirectionalGraph.FindVertex(IEdge) - i.e. just quickly find a vertex in the graph based on the key

thanks
All these methods are usually definted on the graph types.
